<a id="class_ModifierBoneTarget3D"></a>

# ModifierBoneTarget3D

**Inherits:** [SkeletonModifier3D](class_skeletonmodifier3d.md) **<** [Node3D](class_node3d.md) **<** [Node](class_node.md) **<** [Object](class_object.md)

Ð node that dynamically copies the 3D transform of a bone in its parent [Skeleton3D](class_skeleton3d.md).

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

This node selects a bone in a [Skeleton3D](class_skeleton3d.md) and attaches to it. This means that the **ModifierBoneTarget3D** node will dynamically copy the 3D transform of the selected bone.

The functionality is similar to [BoneAttachment3D](class_boneattachment3d.md), but this node adopts the [SkeletonModifier3D](class_skeletonmodifier3d.md) cycle and is intended to be used as another [SkeletonModifier3D](class_skeletonmodifier3d.md)'s target.
